abstract: Google and Verizon held a conference call to discuss a joint proposal on net neutrality policy.
snippet: Google and Verizon held a conference call to discuss a joint proposal on net neutrality policy.
lead_paragraph: 4:09 p.m. | Updated  Our article on this news has been posted.

headline.main: Google and Verizon Announce Net Neutrality Proposal

abstract: The Droid announces itself, prompting self-reflection.
snippet: The Droid announces itself, prompting self-reflection.
lead_paragraph: My new smartphone is very smart indeed. And, frankly, a little insecure. It knows its own name, and it keeps shouting it at me to get my attention.

headline.main: My Phone Is Shouting at Me

abstract: The plan, which includes exceptions for wireless Net access, was criticized by groups that want to keep the network as open as possible.
snippet: The plan, which includes exceptions for wireless Net access, was criticized by groups that want to keep the network as open as possible.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Google and Verizon on Monday introduced a proposal for how Internet service should be regulated  and were immediately criticized by groups that favor keeping the network as open as possible.

headline.main: Web Plan From Google and Verizon Is Criticized
headline.print_headline: Web Plan From Google And Verizon Is Criticized

byline.original: By Claire Cain Miller and Miguel Helft
